TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
YES IT HAS INDEED!!!! but that's a good thing. I just wanna say I'm not trying to control you Mike\_NZ just wanna help out!!!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Good work guys. I have alot of nasa's facilities etc ed models on my hdd. I can set it up in blender for pics and give the models to reese...

sounds good!

> 
> WOW! This project, originally intended JUST to keep the shuttle alive, has GROWN by leaps and bounds!

The plan was to make a nasa type pack. Like the 747 and the modules etc

Hey, here's an idea, if possible. Use Reese's vab texture to retexture the normal ingame vab!

> 
> Hey, here's an idea, if possible. Use Reese's vab texture to retexture the normal ingame vab!

I don't think that's possible
Awe.... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

yeah sure!
Hey mike I know your still working on a ton of stuff does the rudder work on the 747 or is it on the to do list all the flight controls work except the rudder

> 
> Hey mike I know your still working on a ton of stuff does the rudder work on the 747 or is it on the to do list all the flight controls work except the rudder

Yeah I have a bad habbit of switching priorities. I will get it going tonight I hope. About to get to my pc to start tonights work now
Awesome dont burn yourself out brother

extra glide, less drag, more lift patch added to page one.

notice the direction on the compass, at that heading speed hardly drops at all

that's aiming 5 degrees below horizon.

it will skip for a bit on a 40k re-entry from 100k

glides more than I think it should but eh..

if MORE glide is wanted I can re edit

![J5IPVXe.png](http://i.imgur.com/J5IPVXe.png)
It is ridiculously easy to manuever on orbit aswell! Sorry if im complaining

> 
> It is ridiculously easy to manuever on orbit aswell! Sorry if im complaining

yes it is. its because I overworked it during development to work out other issues.

is it rcs or reaction wheel power that you want less?

Awesome! First re-entry with the new patch was a beautiful success. I love the new gliding abilities! Great job. I'll keep that cfg forever ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Most fun I had in a while in KSP. 

I didn't notice any changes about orbit maneuvering though.. something has changed there? I like it as it is by the way. However compared to any other stock vessel I have to chase the maneuver target much more with the shuttle. How come? It's not burning straight ahead?
